name: Grinner

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally RESIST in Faction Crypts by 30

skills.name: Bile
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 25% chance of placing a 50% [Increase ATK] buff on all allies for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%

skills.name: Shock
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies. Has a 20% chance of removing 1 random buff from each target.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 6 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 7 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 8 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Unbury
skills.raw_description:
Revives an ally with 50% HP. Places a [Shield] buff on the revived Champion for 2 turns equal to 20% of their MAX HP.
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 3 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 4 Cooldown -1

seo.description: Undead Hordes is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 30 champions. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

faction.raw_description: Awakened by the call of the Corruption, these ghouls andcreatures of the night inhabit the forgotten tombs and darkplaces of the world, and serve as minions to the Dark One. Whilemost are the desecrated carcasses of fallen Telerians, othershave lurked in the darkness for centuries... awaiting their time.
